topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55694ffc636872183d2a4800#post_55694ffc636872183d2a4800
Military service here is 6 months for regular soldiers, 9 months for the specialized guys (paratroopers, military police etc) and a full year for NCO's

The optional civilian service lasts for a full year
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a
